profileText: a Representative from Maryland; born in New Jersey, September 9, 1988; graduated from Haddon Heights High School, Haddon Heights, N.J., 2006; B.A., Towson University, Towson, Md., 2010; M.S., Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Md., 2012; staff, office of government and community affairs, Johns Hopkins Institutions, 2010-2012; government affairs director, National Aquarium, Baltimore, Md., 2012-2016; adjunct professor, Towson University, Towson, Md., 2019-2024; member of the Maryland state senate, 2019-2025; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
